translations: n.暴动；煽动性的言论或行为；妨害治安

sentences.sentence: It is almost absolutely correct that schools' misbehavior gave rise to seditions and agony.
sentences.translation: 几乎可以绝对的说，一些学校的不正当行为已经激发起了骚动和不满。

sentences.sentence: We have found this to be a pestilent man, and raising seditions among all the Jews throughout the world, and author of the sedition of the sect of the Nazarenes.
sentences.translation: 我们查出这人实在是个危险人物。他鼓动天下的一切犹太人作乱，又是纳匝肋教派的魁首。
